alert.note: Alert for Charles City; Dinwiddie; Eastern Chesterfield (Including Col. Heights); Eastern Hanover; Eastern Henrico; New Kent; Prince George; Western Chesterfield; Western Henrico (Including the City of Richmond) (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 4:34PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Chesterfield, northwestern Charles City, Prince George, northwestern New Kent, Henrico, southeastern Hanover and northeastern Dinwiddie Counties, the City of Richmond, the City of Colonial Heights, the City of Hopewell and the City of Petersburg through 515 PM EDT... At 434 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Bon Air to near Chesterfield Court House to 6 miles west of Sutherland. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Richmond, Petersburg, Hopewell, Colonial Heights, Virginia Commonwealth University, Disputanta, Tuckahoe, Chester, Highland Springs, Downtown Richmond, Bon Air, Virginia Union University, Fort Lee, University Of Richmond, Roxbury, Virginia State University, Mechanicsville, Prince George, Bellwood and Garysville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Strong wind gusts are possible with these storms. These wind gusts are capable of knocking down tree limbs, small or weakened trees, and blowing around trash cans, potted plants, lawn furniture, and other light outdoor objects. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central, south central and east central Virginia.

area.areaDesc: Charles City; Dinwiddie; Eastern Chesterfield (Including Col. Heights); Eastern Hanover; Eastern Henrico; New Kent; Prince George; Western Chesterfield; Western Henrico (Including the City of Richmond)
